name: Daily Lovers
description: We provide daily such as biscuits, cakes, cookies, custards, gelatins, ice creams, pastries, pies, puddings, macaroons, sweet soups, tarts, and fruit salad. Fruit is also commonly found in dessert courses because of its naturally occurring sweetness.

name: Cakes
description: We make cake is a flour confection made from flour, sugar, and other ingredients, and is usually baked and cream are also home made.There are many different cake option such as wedding cake,birthday cake,fruit cake etc
